flawed_nl_solution:
The tree has been planted for 9 - 4 = <<9-4=1>>1 years
It will take another 7 - 1 = <<7-1=6>>6 years for it to bear fruit
Lydia will be 9 + 6 = <<9+6=15>>15 years old

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 1. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
